mapper.insert: insert into user_list (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, FILTER_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_list set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILTER_TYPE = #{filterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, FILTER_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from user_list where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, FILTER_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from user_list

select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, FILTER_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from user_list where USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USER_PHONE = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
